column1: Little Goat Diner////Great atmosphere and delicious food. We had the smoked fries
column4: fried chicken and shrimp and grits. Way too much food for the three of us
column5: but we pigged out. The French silk dessert pie was awesome
column6: and huge! Get a table beforehand because the wait is immense. We booked ahead and got right in. Best decision we made.
